description: American bittersweet is a unique and amazing plant species! It is a deciduous, woody vine with glossy green, heart-shaped leaves and showy, yellow-orange berries in early autumn. Its reddish-orange fall color is beautiful, making it ideal for adding a touch of color to any landscape. The berries are also a great food source for birds in the winter, supporting a variety of species. This vigorous grower is easy to establish, is low maintenance and rarely suffers from pests or diseases. American bittersweet is a truly remarkable species that adds beauty and nourishment to any outdoors.
